title: Language-Integrated Instructional Design for Pre-Service Mathematics Teachers Using Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of mathematics pedagogy and understanding of secondary education curricula
context.additional_context: An environment optimized for smartphone-based learning activities, combining in-person classes with digital platforms

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more teaching strategies that consider multilingual learners when explaining mathematical concepts in blended learning environments.
Learners can develop two or more scenarios for solving mathematical problems using smartphone-based digital tools (e.g., language translation apps, visualization tools).
Learners can analyze formative assessment results to revise personalized language-mathematics integrated learning roadmaps.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
